sys_script.name: Reset Counter Fields

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_user">x_441902_task_ac_raw_assignment_payloadVALCHANGES^x_441902_task_ac_raw_assignment_payloadISEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="x_441902_task_ac_raw_assignment_payload" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="x_441902_task_ac_raw_assignment_payload" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Reset Counter Fields</name><order>1000</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
	var mapping = JSON.parse(gs.getProperty(TaskCounter.PROPS.PAYLOAD_MAP));
	for (var key in mapping) {
		if (!current.isValidField(mapping[key])) {
			continue;
		}
		current.setValue(mapping[key], 0);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-03 23:28:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7db6bb422f5700107d7d59a72799b6b8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reset Counter Fields</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Task Assignment Counter " source="x_441902_task_ac">19d84d382f9b00107d7d59a72799b652</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Task Assignment Counter ">19d84d382f9b00107d7d59a72799b652</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7db6bb422f5700107d7d59a72799b6b8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-04 11:24:41</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7db6bb422f5700107d7d59a72799b6b8"/></record_update>
